Human Phenotype Ontology: Age of Death

Source: R/data.R
hpo_death.Rd

Age of Death associated with each disease, and by extension, each phenotype.

data("hpo_death")

Format

data.table

Source

terms <- ontologyIndex::get_descendants(ontology = hpo, roots = "HP:0011420", exclude_roots = TRUE) aod <- lapply(stats::setNames(terms, terms), function(hpo_id){ messager("Extracting API data for",hpo_id,v=verbose) d <- hpo_api(hpo_id = hpo_id, type = "diseases")$diseases }) |> data.table::rbindlist(fill = TRUE, use.names = TRUE, idcol = "AgeOfDeath") aod$AgeOfDeath_name <- harmonise_phenotypes(phenotypes = aod$AgeOfDeath, as_hpo_ids = FALSE) #### Convert AoD to numeric scores #### dict <- hpo_dict(type="AgeOfDeath") aod$AgeOfDeath_score <- dict[aod$AgeOfDeath_name] #### Link diseases to HPO phenotypes #### annot <- load_phenotype_to_genes(filename = "phenotype.hpoa") hpo_death <- data.table::merge.data.table(aod, annot[,c("HPO_ID","DiseaseName")], by.x="diseaseName", by.y = "DiseaseName") usethis::use_data(hpo_death, overwrite = TRUE)
